name: add_comment_to_media
description: Adds a comment to a media post.

media_id.description: The ID of the media post being commented on.

user_id.description: The ID of the user making the comment.

name: create_media_post
description: Creates a new media post associated with a user.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who owns the media. Must be a non-empty string.

image_url.description: URL of the media image. Must be a non-empty string.

caption.description:
Caption or description for the media. Must be a string.
Defaults to "".

name: create_user
description: Creates a new user with a given ID, name, and username.

user_id.description: The unique identifier for the user.

name: delete_media_post
description: Deletes a specified media post from the system.

media_id.description:
The unique identifier of the media post to delete.
Must be a non-empty string.

name: delete_user
description: Deletes a specified user from the system.

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user to delete.

name: get_user_details
description: Retrieves information about a specific user.

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user to retrieve. Cannot be empty.

name: get_user_id_by_username
description: Searches for a user by their username and returns the corresponding user ID.

username.description:
The username to look up in the system.
This field cannot be an empty string or contain only whitespace.

name: list_all_media_posts
description: Lists all media posts in the system.

name: list_all_users
description: Lists all users in the system.

name: list_media_comments
description: Lists all comments on a specific media post.

media_id.description: The ID of the media post to retrieve comments for.
